title: prasanna gOpAlakrSNam
sahitya:
prasanna gOpAla krSNam patim karOmi pramudita sarOja nEtram patita pAvana sugOtram aham


anupallavi

 prasiddha gOvardhana giridhara caritram akrUrasya mitram vidhIndra shuka pramukhAdi 
vandya sarasija pada yugaLam surataru samUha mUlam bhIma nadi tIra sundara puruSam 
nIrada nIla vapuSam suraripu madhu murahara caritam aham


caraNam    muktA makuTa mukuTI krta kEsham mukhE mandahAsam pradyupta nAda 
surucira maNigaNa lOla kanTha dEsham nirata gOkulEsham prakAsham aham
